chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: I will show you its practical implementation.

chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: This was it for my side.

chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: Please make sure that you subscribe the channel.

chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: I will see you all in the next video.

chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: Have a great day ahead.

chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: Thank you, Vandal.

chunks.title: Post Prunning And Pre Prunning
chunks.text: Bye.
